global_attributes: Conventions CF-1.7 title RADS 4 pass file institution EUMETSAT / NOAA / TU Delft source radar altimeter references RADS Data Manual, Version 4.2 or later featureType trajectory ellipsoid TOPEX
satellites: 2a h2a hy-2a hy2a 3a s3a sentinel-3a sentinel3a sntnl-3a 3b s3b sentinel-3b sentinel3b sntnl-3b 6a s6a s6mf sentinel-6a sentinel-6mf sentinel6a sntnl-6a c2 cs2 cryosat-2 cryosat2 e1 er1 ers-1 ers1 e2 er2 ers-2 ers2 g1 gfo gfo-1 gfo1 gs geo geosat j1 ja1 jason-1 jason1 j2 ja2 jason-2 jason2 j3 ja3 jason-3 jason3 n1 en1 env envisat pn pos poseidon tx top tpx topex sa srl saral sw swt swot

var.name: sla
var.data: alt range SUB dry_tropo SUB wet_tropo SUB iono SUB dac SUB tide_solid SUB tide_ocean SUB tide_load SUB tide_pole SUB ssb SUB mss SUB ref_frame_offset SUB

quality_flag.sat: 3a 3b 6a e1 e2 g1 j1 j2 j3 n1 tx sw
e2 j1 j2 j3 sw tx

var.comment: Sea level determined from satellite altitude - range - all altimetric corrections

var.name: sla_20hz
var.data: alt_20hz range_20hz SUB dry_tropo SUB wet_tropo SUB iono SUB dac SUB tide_solid SUB tide_ocean SUB tide_load SUB tide_pole SUB ssb SUB mss SUB ref_frame_offset SUB
var.quality_flag: swh sig0 range_rms range_numval flags peakiness
var.comment: Sea level determined from satellite 20-Hz altitude - 20-Hz range - all altimetric corrections

var.name: sla_mle3
var.data: alt range_ku_mle3 SUB dry_tropo SUB wet_tropo SUB iono_alt_smooth_mle3 SUB dac SUB tide_solid SUB tide_ocean SUB tide_load SUB tide_pole SUB ssb_mle3 SUB mss SUB ref_frame_offset_mle3 SUB
var.quality_flag: swh_ku_mle3 sig0_ku_mle3 range_rms_ku_mle3 range_numval_ku_mle3 flags_mle3 swh_rms_ku_mle3 sig0_rms_ku_mle3
var.comment: Sea level determined from satellite altitude - MLE3 range - all (MLE3) altimetric corrections

var.name: sla_plrm
var.data: alt range_ku_plrm SUB dry_tropo SUB wet_tropo_plrm SUB iono_alt_plrm SUB dac SUB tide_solid SUB tide_ocean SUB tide_load SUB tide_pole SUB ssb_cls_plrm SUB mss SUB ref_frame_offset_plrm SUB
var.quality_flag: swh_ku_plrm sig0_ku_plrm range_rms_ku_plrm range_numval_ku_plrm flags swh_rms_ku_plrm sig0_rms_ku_plrm attitude
var.comment: Sea level determined from satellite altitude - PLRM range - all (PLRM) altimetric corrections

var.name: sla_adaptive
var.data: alt range_ku_adaptive SUB dry_tropo SUB wet_tropo SUB iono_alt_smooth_adaptive SUB dac SUB tide_solid SUB tide_ocean SUB tide_load SUB tide_pole SUB ssb_cls_adaptive SUB mss SUB ref_frame_offset_adaptive SUB
var.quality_flag: swh_ku_adaptive sig0_ku_adaptive range_rms_ku_adaptive range_numval_ku_adaptive flags_adaptive swh_rms_ku_adaptive sig0_rms_ku_adaptive
var.comment: Sea level determined from satellite altitude - range (adaptive retracking) - all altimetric corrections (adaptive retracking)

var.name: sla_nr
var.data: alt range_ku_nr SUB dry_tropo SUB wet_tropo SUB iono_alt_smooth_nr SUB dac SUB tide_solid SUB tide_ocean SUB tide_load SUB tide_pole SUB ssb_cls_nr SUB mss SUB ref_frame_offset_nr SUB
var.quality_flag: swh_ku_nr sig0_ku_nr range_rms_ku_nr range_numval_ku_nr flags_nr swh_rms_ku_nr sig0_rms_ku_nr
var.comment: Sea level determined from satellite altitude - range (numerical retracking) - all altimetric corrections (numerical retracking)

var.name: ssha
var.comment: Sea level determined from satellite altitude - range - all altimetric corrections. These values were computed when the data set was created, in contrast to the sla variable.

var.name: ssha_20hz
var.comment: Sea level determined from satellite 20-Hz altitude - 20-Hz range - all altimetric corrections. These values were computed when the data set was created, in contrast to the sla_20hz variable.

var.name: ssha_mle3
var.comment: Sea level determined from satellite altitude - MLE3 range - all (MLE3) altimetric corrections. These values were computed when the data set was created, in contrast to the sla_mle3 variable.

var.name: ssha_plrm
var.comment: Sea level determined from satellite altitude - PLRM range - all (PLRM) altimetric corrections. These values were computed when the data set was created, in contrast to the sla_plrm variable.

var.name: ssha_adaptive
var.comment: Sea level determined from satellite altitude - range (adaptive retracking) - all altimetric corrections (adaptive retracking). These values were computed when the data set was created, in contrast to the sla_adaptive variable.

var.name: ssha_nr
var.comment: Sea level determined from satellite altitude - range (numerical retracking) - all altimetric corrections (numerical retracking). These values were computed when the data set was created, in contrast to the sla_nr variable.

var.name: time
var.comment: UTC time of measurement. Attribute leap_second gives time of leap second if any occurs during the data set

var.name: time_rel_eq
var.comment: UTC time relative to the equator crossing (negative is before, positive is after)

var.name: time_local_solar
var.comment: Local solar time (in seconds) since start of the solar day

var.name: time_ymdhms
var.comment: UTC time formatted as yymmddhhmmss

var.name: time_mjd
var.comment: UTC time of measurement expressed in Modified Julian Days

var.name: time_2000
var.comment: UTC time of measurement

var.name: time_1950
var.comment: UTC time of measurement

var.name: time_20hz
var.comment: UTC time of 20-Hz measurement. Attribute leap_second gives time of leap second if any occurs during the data set

var.name: meas_ind
var.comment: Added to be CF-compliant

var.name: wvf_ind
var.comment: Added to be CF-compliant

var.name: lat
var.comment: Positive latitude is North latitude, negative latitude is South latitude

var.name: lat_20hz
var.comment: Positive latitude is North latitude, negative latitude is South latitude

var.name: lon
var.comment: East longitude relative to Greenwich meridian

var.name: lon_20hz
var.comment: East longitude relative to Greenwich meridian

var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.name: alt_rate
var.comment: The reference surface for the orbital altitude rate is MSS

var.name: range_ka
var.long_name: Ka-band range corrected for instr. effects

var.name: range_ku
var.long_name: Ku-band range corrected for instr. effects

var.name: range_ku_mle3
var.long_name: Ku-band range corrected for instr. effects (MLE3)

var.name: range_ku_plrm
var.long_name: Ku-band range corrected for instr. effects (PLRM)

var.name: range_ku_adaptive
var.long_name: Ku-band range corrected for instr. effects (adaptive retracking)

var.name: range_ku_nr
var.long_name: Ku-band range corrected for instr. effects (numerical retracking)

var.name: range_20hz_ku
var.long_name: 20-Hz Ku-band range corrected for instr. effects

var.name: range_c
var.long_name: C-band range corrected for instr. effects

var.name: range_s
var.long_name: S-band range corrected for instr. effects

var.name: range_tracker_20hz_ku
var.long_name: 20-Hz Ku-band tracker range corrected for instr. effects
var.comment: Position of the range window according to on-board tracker, corrected for internal delays and variations of USO

var.name: range_used_20hz_ku
var.long_name: 20-Hz flag for utilization in the computation of 1-Hz Ku-band range
var.comment: Map of valid points used to compute the 1-Hz Ku-band altimeter range, SWH, and sigma0

var.name: dry_tropo_ecmwf
var.comment: A dry tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for dry troposphere delays

var.name: dry_tropo_ncep
var.comment: A dry tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for dry troposphere delays

var.name: dry_tropo_era
var.comment: A dry tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for dry troposphere delays

var.name: dry_tropo_era5
var.comment: A dry tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for dry troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_rad
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_rad_plrm
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_rad_sst_gam
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_ecmwf
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_ncep
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_nvap
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_tovs_ssmi
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_tovs_ncep
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_era
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_era5
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_rad_enh
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_comp
var.source: radiometer and external model and radiometer data
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_diff
var.long_name: difference between radiometer and ECMWF wet tropospheric correction
var.comment: Determined by subtracting wet_tropo_ecmwf from wet_tropo_rad

var.name: gpd_wet_tropo_cor
var.comment: Computed at the altimeter time-tag through space-time objective analysis using the GPD+ algorithm, by combining all available observations. The correction is calibrated against the SSMIS data set. A wet tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for the wet tropospheric range delay of the radar pulse.

var.name: gpd_reference_height
var.long_name: height at which the GPD+ WTC has been computed

var.name: gpd_source_flag
var.long_name: GPD+ wet tropospheric correction source flag
var.flag_values: valid_onboard_mwr_value from_onboard_mwr_observations from_simwr_observations from_mwr_and_simwr_observations from_gnss_observations_only from_mwr_and_gnss_observations from_simwr_and_gnss_observations from_mwr_and_simwr_and_gnss_observations from_era5_model

var.name: iono_alt
var.sat: 2a 3a 3b 6a j1 j2 j3 n1 tx sw
var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.name: iono_bent
var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.sat: 2a 3a 3b 6a j1 j2 j3 n1 sw tx
var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.name: iono_alt_mle3
var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.name: iono_alt_plrm
var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.name: iono_alt_adaptive
var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.name: iono_alt_nr
var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

alias.name: iono
alias.sat: 2a 3a 3b 6a j1 j2 j3 n1 tx sw

var.name: inv_bar_static
var.comment: Effect of the static atmospheric pressure on sea surface, subtracting global mean

var.name: inv_bar_global
var.comment: Global mean effect of the static atmospheric pressure on sea surface height

var.name: inv_bar_mog2d
var.source: CNES/CNRS-LEGOS/CLS MOG2D-G or TUGO HR barotropic model with ECMWF forcing
var.comment: Combined low and high frequency effect of atmospheric pressure and wind on sea surface height

var.name: inv_bar_mog2d_era
var.long_name: MOG2D dynamic atmospheric correction (ERA Interim forcing)
var.source: CNES/CNRS-LEGOS/CLS MOG2D-G HR barotropic model with ERA-Interim forcing, ESA SLCCI project
var.comment: Combined low and high frequency effect of atmospheric pressure and wind on sea surface height

var.name: inv_bar_mok2d
var.comment: Scaled version of static IB to match MOG2D

var.name: inv_bar_static_era5
var.comment: Effect of the static atmospheric pressure on sea surface, subtracting global mean

var.name: tide_solid
var.comment: Calculated using second and third degree constituents, excluding permanent tide

var.name: tide_ocean_got00
var.comment: Ocean tide variation including long-period equilibrium tides

var.name: tide_ocean_fes04
var.comment: Ocean tide variation including long-period equilibrium and non-equilibrium tides

var.name: tide_ocean_webtide
var.comment: Ocean tide variation including long-period equilibrium tides

var.name: tide_ocean_got48
var.comment: Ocean tide variation including long-period equilibrium tides

var.name: tide_ocean_got410
var.comment: Ocean tide variation including long-period equilibrium tides, extrapolated into the coast

var.name: tide_ocean_fes14
var.comment: Ocean tide variation including long-period equilibrium and non-equilibrium tides, extrapolated into the coast

var.name: tide_load_got00
var.comment: Load tide variation to be added to ocean tide

var.name: tide_load_fes04
var.comment: Load tide variation to be added to ocean tide

var.name: tide_load_got48
var.comment: Load tide variation to be added to ocean tide

var.name: tide_load_got410
var.comment: Load tide variation to be added to ocean tide

var.name: tide_load_fes14
var.comment: Load tide variation to be added to ocean tide

var.name: tide_pole
var.comment: Variation of absolute sea level due to polar motion

var.name: tide_internal
var.comment: Only includes the so-called static harmonic components. It is not included as a correction to the sea surface height, but users can use it to remove the internal tide from the sea surface height anomaly

var.name: ssb_bm3
var.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added to range to correct for sea state delays

var.name: ssb_cls
var.sat: 2a 3a 3b 6a c2 j1 j2 j3 n1 sw
var.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added to range to correct for sea state delays

if.long_name: Tran et al. 2021 non-parametric sea state bias
Tran et al. 2020 non-parametric sea state bias
if.comment: This model is actually based on Jason-3 data and not Sentinel-6, and will be replaced later.

var.name: ssb_cls_c
var.comment: This sea state bias correction is added to C-band range when determining ionospheric correction.

if.long_name: Tran et al. 2012 non-parametric sea state bias (C-band)
if.comment: This model is actually based on Jason-2 data and not Sentinel-3, and will be replaced later.

if.long_name: Tran et al. 2020 non-parametric sea state bias (C-band)
if.comment: This model is actually based on Jason-3 data and not Sentinel-6, and will be replaced later.

var.name: ssb_cls_mle3
var.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added to range to correct for sea state delays

if.long_name: Tran et al. 2020 non-parametric sea state bias (MLE3)
if.comment: This model is actually based on Jason-3 data and not Sentinel-6, and will be replaced later.

var.name: ssb_cls_plrm
var.long_name: Tran et al. 2012 non-parametric sea state bias (PLRM)
var.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added to range to correct for sea state delays. This model is actually based on Jason-2 data and not Sentinel-3, and will be replaced later.

var.name: ssb_tran2012
var.long_name: Tran et al. 2012 non-parametric sea state bias
var.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added to range to correct for sea state delays

var.name: ssb_tran2019
var.long_name: Tran et al. 2019 non-parametric sea state bias
var.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added to range to correct for sea state delays

var.name: ssb_tran2019_3d
var.long_name: Tran et al. 2019 3D non-parametric sea state bias
var.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added to range to correct for sea state delays

var.name: ssb_cls_3d
var.long_name: Tran et al. 2020 3D sea state bias for retracked range
var.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added to range to correct for sea state delays

var.name: ssb_cls_adaptive
var.long_name: Tran et al. 2020 sea state bias for retracked range (adaptive retracking)
var.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added to range to correct for sea state delays

var.name: ssb_cls_nr
var.long_name: Tran et al. 2020 sea state bias for retracked range (numerical retracking)
var.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added to range to correct for sea state delays

var.name: ssb_cls_3d_adaptive
var.long_name: Tran et al. 2020 3D sea state bias for retracked range (adaptive retracking)
var.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added to range to correct for sea state delays

var.name: ssb_cls_c_adaptive
var.long_name: Tran et al. 2020 non-parametric sea state bias (C-band) (adaptive retracking)
var.comment: This sea state bias correction is added to C-band range when determining ionospheric correction.

var.name: ssb_cls_c_nr
var.long_name: Tran et al. 2020 non-parametric sea state bias (C-band) (numerical retracking)
var.comment: This sea state bias correction is added to C-band range when determining ionospheric correction.

var.name: ssb_tx
var.comment: This sea state bias correction is added to K-band range when determining ionospheric correction.

var.name: ssb_tx_mle3
var.comment: This sea state bias correction is added to K-band range when determining ionospheric correction.

var.name: ssb_tx_c
var.comment: This sea state bias correction is added to C-band range when determining ionospheric correction.

alias.name: ssb
alias.sat: 2a 3a 3b 6a c2 j1 j2 j3 n1 sw

var.name: latency

if.comment: The processing of radiometer data depends on this flag: 0 = open ocean, 1 = coastal ocean processing with HRMR and AMR, 2 = coastal ocean processing with AMR only, 3 = invalid due to land contamination

var.name: surface_type_rad1
var.comment: The processing of radiometer data depends on this flag: 0 = open ocean, 2 = coastal ocean processing, 3 = invalid due to land contamination

var.name: surface_type_rad2
var.comment: The processing of radiometer data depends on this flag: 0 = open ocean, 2 = coastal ocean processing, 3 = invalid due to land contamination

var.name: qual_alt_rain_ice
var.sat: 3a 3b 6a g1 j1 j2 j3 n1 pn sa tx sw

var.name: qual_rad_rain_ice
var.sat: 3a 3b 6a e1 e2 j1 j2 j3 n1 pn tx
var.long_name: corruption of radiometer measurement (rain or ice)

var.long_name: corruption of radiometer side-1 measurement (rain or ice)

var.name: qual_rad2_rain_ice

var.flag_masks: bad_tb_238 bad_tb_365

var.name: dsig0_atmos_ku
var.sat: 2a 3a 3b 6a c2 e1 e2 j1 j2 j3 n1 pn tx sw
var.long_name: Ku-band backscatter coefficient correction due to atmosphere/attitude

var.name: qual_dsig0_atmos
var.long_name: flag indicating the use of climatological values for the computation of sigma0 atmospheric attenuation

var.name: dsig0_atten
var.long_name: Difference between the expected Ku-band backscatter coefficient (based on the C-band backscatter coefficient) and the measured Ku-band backscatter coefficient

var.name: dsig0_swh_att
var.long_name: backscatter coefficient correction due to SWH/attitude
var.comment: Correction already added to backscatter coefficient

var.name: dsig0_range
var.long_name: backscatter coefficient correction due to range
var.comment: Correction already added to backscatter coefficient

var.name: dsig0_temp
var.long_name: backscatter coefficient correction due to temperature
var.comment: Correction already added to backscatter coefficient

var.name: liquid_water_rad
var.sat: 2a 3a 3b 6a e1 e2 j1 j2 j3 n1 pn sa tx sw

var.name: water_vapor_rad
var.sat: 2a 3a 3b 6a e1 e2 j1 j2 j3 sa sw tx pn

var.name: mqe
var.long_name: mean quadratic error of waveform fit

var.name: mqe_20hz_ku
var.long_name: 20-Hz mean quadratic error of Ku-band waveform fit

var.name: noise_floor_rms_ku
var.long_name: std dev of Ku-band noise floor of waveforms

var.name: flags_star_tracker
var.flag_masks: str1_on str2_on str3_on

var.name: waveform_scale_20hz
var.comment: scale factor (received/transmitted) power, converted to dB, including instrumental effects

var.name: tide_equil
var.comment: The long-period equilibrium ocean tide is included in the ocean tide values of the GOT and FES tide models

var.name: tide_non_equil
var.comment: The long-period non-equilibrium ocean tide results from the corresponding FES tide model and is included in the FES ocean tide value

var.name: tide_lunar_nodal
var.data: time 6.128907968287D-07 MUL 55.151702881 SUB 360 FMOD COSD lat SIND SQR 1.5 MUL 0.5 SUB MUL 0.01220911657 MUL

var.name: wave_m1
var.long_name: WaveWatch3 first moment of wave height

var.name: mean_wave_direction
var.long_name: mean direction of the sea surface wave

var.name: significant_swell_wave_height
var.long_name: modelled spectral significant swell wave height

var.name: mean_swell_wave_direction
var.long_name: mean direction of the sea surface swell wave

var.name: dist_coast
var.comment: Negative numbers are inland, positive numbers are offshore

var.name: rad_dist_coast
var.long_name: radiometer main beam radial distance to land
var.comment: Negative numbers are inland, positive numbers are offshore

var.name: rad1_dist_coast
var.long_name: radiometer side-1 radial distance to land
var.comment: Negative numbers are inland, positive numbers are offshore

var.name: rad2_dist_coast
var.long_name: radiometer side-2 radial distance to land
var.comment: Negative numbers are inland, positive numbers are offshore

var.name: prox_coast
var.sat: 2a 3a 3b 6a c2 j1 j2 j3 n1 pn sa tx sw
var.comment: Dimensionless measure of the effect of land over altimetric waveforms, where -1 means unaffected by land (open-ocean) and 1 means totally affected by land (inland); can be used for screening purposes in place of distance from coast

var.name: angle_coast
var.long_name: angle of approach to the coast
var.comment: Angle of approach to the closest coast. 0 is parallel to the coast with the land on the right. Positive values indicate the satellite is approaching the land. Negative values indicate the satellite is leaving the land. Values close to +/-180 degrees have the land on the left.

var.name: seaice_class
var.flag_values: ocean first_year_sea_ice wet_ice multi_year_sea_ice ambiguous_mixture_of_type not_evaluated

var.name: seaice_conc
var.source: NOAA Optimal Interpolation Sea Surface Temperature v2

var.name: sst
var.source: NOAA Optimal Interpolation Sea Surface Temperature v2

var.name: sst_mean
var.source: NOAA Optimal Interpolation Sea Surface Temperature v2

var.name: dry_tropo_airtide
var.long_name: air tide correction to the dry tropospheric correction
var.comment: Add to dry tropospheric correction to account for missing S1 and S2 tidal signal

var.name: mss_annual
var.long_name: annual variation of mean sea level
var.comment: Annual variation of sea level with respect to long-term mean sea level

var.name: gia
var.comment: Change of land elevation relative to geoid due to GIA since 1 Jan 2000

var.name: orbit_type
var.flag_values: osf fos navatt doris_nav gnss_roe pod_moe salp_moe pod_poe salp_poe
var.comment: Indication about which orbit solution was used for alt_gdre

var.name: cal1_range_ku
var.long_name: CAL1 range correction applied to Ku-band range

var.name: cal1_range_c
var.long_name: CAL1 range correction applied to C-band range

var.name: cal1_power_ku
var.long_name: CAL1 power scaling applied to Ku-band sigma0

var.name: cal1_power_c
var.long_name: CAL1 power scaling applied to C-band sigma0

var.name: first_meas_time
var.long_name: time of first measurement in pass

var.name: last_meas_time
var.long_name: time of last measurement in pass
